snippet.title: Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato - Official Release Window Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2024
snippet.description: Here's another look at the rich world, magical adventure, and characters of Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato in this release date trailer for the upcoming adventure game. Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato will be available on Steam, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S in August 2024. When Miho steps into the pantry to get a potato for his grandmothers' soup, he's pulled into a distant fantastical land where he must retrace the steps of a mysterious great traveler before him.
